GSD.description:
drivers: staging: rtl8192u: Fix deadlock in ieee80211_beacons_stop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit b465bb2ebf666116c1ac745cb80c65154dc0d27e. For more details please see the references link.
